Sept. 23, 2000 D West Wales BBA Contest (Championship Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Championship Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-champion-5461
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - flugel - Cwmaman. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed.
Feb. 26, 2011, 11:48 p.m. July 3, 2020, 8:50 p.m.
1 Tredegar Town Band Steve Bastable
2 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band John Hudson
3 Burry Port Town Michael Thorne On Alderley Edge
4 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Jim Davies
5 Parc and Dare Band Craig Roberts
6 Abergavenny Borough Band Eric Powell
7 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Adrian Morton The Year of the Dragon
Withdrawn BTM Band Gareth Pritchard
